text:
I can't copy a template from a portal to another. I also tried to remove all the dependencies but looks like that do nothing (in the email I still getting the error with the full list of thing to copy).
Its a really common issue for me, anyone knows how can I manage without dependent on HS team?
both portals have to have design manager 2 enabled

it's not the first time it happens to me, looks like playing with CMs usually breaks that to me.
To add extra weirdness:
I got an error if I try to copy but my mate have just copied to the same portal (and another one) without any issue :thinking_face:
Do you have super admin rights in both? Or admin rights in both?
One of my dev's ran into that before with permissions issues that caused the error on the recieving portal
I don't have exactly the same rights. I am superadmin on in the "origin" portal and "just" admin in the other one  but that should be enough I think?
